title: Retool
text:
The Retool project aims to help us figure out how to deal with two big challenges: responding to climate change and making democracy stronger.

After researching the field, we chose this modern and friendly design that helps people understand what it is about and makes it easy for them to get involved.

The Retool project is a European program that is coordinated by the National Technical University of Athens.

The website was co-designed with Uppercut design

title: P & A Papaioannou O.E
text:
P & A Papaioannou O.E. is a car service company that approached me to redesign their website with a more professional and modern look.

After conducting extensive research into the car service field and their target audience, I developed a fresh and modern design that perfectly fits their brand image.

The new design effectively showcases their services and provides an exceptional user experience, helping them stand out in their industry.

title: Transience
text:
Transience looks at how European industries are becoming more sustainable by combining circularity and decarbonization.

The website features a sleek and modern design with minimalistic elements, clear typography and organized sections for navigation. The layout provides quick access to project details and resources for a user-friendly experience.

The Transience project is a European program that is coordinated by the National Technical University of Athens.

The website was co-designed with Uppercut design

title: Achieve
text:
Achieve, a Horizon Europe initiative, works to boost honest efforts in fighting climate change, aiming for net-zero emissions by mid-century.

The website features a clean, modern design with easy navigation and clear communication. It uses ample white space, a blue and green color scheme and interactive elements to enhance user experience and make information accessible.

Achieve is a European program that is coordinated by the National Technical University of Athens.

The website was co-designed with Uppercut design
